meanings.sent1: The tree in our yard is branchless, with only a single trunk.
meanings.sent2: The branchless shrub stood tall in the garden, uncluttered by any additional growth.
meanings.sent3: The branchless plant looked like a tiny green pole, amusing the children in the park.
meanings.sent4: The branchless tree resembled a giant toothpick against the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The branchless tree stood out in the forest, its simplicity making it easy to spot.

meanings.sent1: The branchless road stretched straight ahead, without any turns or forks.
meanings.sent2: The branchless ruler was perfect for measuring long, unbroken lines.
meanings.sent3: The branchless cake was a hit at the party, as everyone loved its simple shape.
meanings.sent4: The branchless horizon seemed to go on forever, uninterrupted by any obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The branchless field looked vast and endless, lacking any boundaries or separations.
